headline: Verizon: Undervalued Income Play Yielding Almost 7% With A New CEO
summary: Discover why Verizon (VZ) offers a 6.7% yield, strong cash flow, and turnaround potential under new leadership.

headline: OUTFRONT Names Twitter Veteran Stacy Minero as New Chief Marketing & Experience Officer
summary: OUTFRONT Media (NYSE: OUT), one of the largest and most trusted out-of-home media companies in the United States, today announced two key hires to its leadership team: Stacy Minero as Chief Marketing & Experience Officer and Abhi Vyas as Vice President, Performance Marketing. These appointments were announced by CEO Nick Brien as OUTFRONT advances its vision for a new era of in-real-life (IRL) marketing.
